programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como travels to Miami, FL and learns from Rick Smith, who has worked with Jack Nicklaus, Phil Mickelson, and numerous Major champions. Smith shows Como numerous drills that help his clients produce power and accuracy.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como travels to Frederica Learning Center and sees how Tony Ruggiero trains some of the top young players in the game. 2019 U.S. Amateur Champion Andy Ogletree shares how Tony has him prepping for a tee time in the Masters with Tiger Woods.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.sub-title: Bradley Hughes - Path to Great Golf
programme.desc: Chris Como travels to Holly Tree Country Club and learns how Bradley Hughes uses his playing experience to coach today's top players. Hughes reveals the most effective way to learn the swing and demonstrates a variety of drills.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Bradley Hughes helps players of all skill levels become better ball strikers. Hughes also reveals his key insights that help him coach Brendon Todd, Brandt Snedeker, and other top touring professionals.

programme.title: Golfer's Guide: Ultimate Distance
programme.desc: Ultimate Distance is your step-by-step blueprint to hitting it longer and more consistently than ever before; breaking down key moves that generate power with the driver while also teaching you how to dial in your iron distances for total control.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to stick your mid range to full swing wedge shots; learn how to make solid contact like Collin Morikawa, hit it straight down your target line like Steve Stricker and control distance like Rory McIlroy.
